name: Zeus
title: Lord of Olympus
lore: Lord of Heaven, father of gods, Zeus treats all the Heroes as if they were his rambunctious, rebellious children.

arcLightning.name: Arc Lightning
arcLightning.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that bounces between enemies.

lightningBolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightningBolt.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike a target, stunning briefly and revealing them.

staticField.name: Static Field
staticField.description: Zeus's spells shock nearby enemies, dealing damage based on their current HP.

thundergodsWrath.name: Thundergod's Wrath
thundergodsWrath.description: Strikes all enemy heroes with bolts from the sky, dealing damage and revealing them.
